item.description:
Boston SEO & Affiliate Internet Marketing Networking Group.

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Robbins Library
700 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02476
ph 781-316-3200

@ Community Room That holds a 100 people

Take The elevator to the basement

Parking: Try on Mass Ave if not there is a lot across the street behind Bank of America & Not Your Average Joe's restaurant

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking & FOOD from sponsor...

Gourmet Gift Baskets .com

Enjoy a sampling of gourmet treats from an upscale gift basket e-comerce site that offers excellent prices


Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

7:45 to 8:00pm: Guest Speaker:

Ryan D. Abood

Ryan is the CEO of GourmetGiftBaskets.com in Manchester, NH and a recent Babson MBA graduate. Who's company just earned the fastest growing internet retailer for 2008 by Internet Retailer. GourmetGiftBaskets.com grew its web sales by an impressive 172.7% in 2008 to $12 million from $4.4 million in 2007.

Ryan will share what did & didn't work to promote the site for top search engine rankings to help put them on the top 500 list by Internet Retailer. Trust us, this is a speaker that you DON"T want to miss out on!

Follow Ryan on Twitter @RyanAbood

8:00pm to 8:15pm Open Q&A & Advice

We will then open the discussion up to Q&A & have are SEO expert members share some of there own advice for how GourmetGiftBaskets.com could potentially improve there SEO rankings.

8:15 to 8:45pm Open Round Table Discussion


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend. Looking for speakers for October & November.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the next event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity. Looking for an October & November food sponsor?

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group Monthly Meeting
